casebody.data:
HOWELL
v.
N.C. WAYNE COUNTY DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES, et al. 326P15-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016

Burl Anderson Howell, For Howell, Burl Anderson.

Michael T. Wood, Special Deputy Attorney General, E.B. Borden Parker, Attorney at Law, Goldsboro, For N.C. Wayne County *237Department of Health and Human Services, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of July 2016 by Petitioner for Appeal In Forma Pauperis:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."
